summary: Software Development Engineer with 3+ years of experience in distributed systems, observability, and cloud engineering. Currently pursuing MS in Information Management at University of Washington (3.9 GPA). Previously SDE at Morgan Stanley and AWS intern, specializing in building scalable ETL pipelines, network monitoring solutions, and multi-agent AI systems. Co-founded Aamara Technologies, leading 15 developers to deliver 6 profitable projects. Strong expertise in Python, Java, C++, LLMs, and cloud platforms.

properties.name: AskHusky: Multi-Agentic Student Support Assistant
properties.description: Built a multi-agent LLM-based assistant using the CrewAI framework, integrating Canvas LMS, UW Calendar, iSchool Websites, and university web resources to unify student information access and automate workflows like event creation, grade retrieval, and resource or information lookup
properties.impact: Demoed to iSchool Dean, earning recognition for potential to enhance student experience

properties.name: eBPF-based Metrics Collection Framework
properties.description: Engineered an eBPF-based metrics collection framework for DynamoDB's front-end EC2 instances, enhancing packet-level visibility from Load Balancers to DynamoDB entry service
properties.impact: <5 microseconds latency overhead in non-prod environments

properties.name: Cost-Efficient Network Monitoring Solution
properties.description: Designed a cost-efficient network monitoring solution by integrating existing AWS infrastructure and services
properties.impact: Saved an estimated $1M annually in monitoring expenses

properties.name: Mimir Integration for Observability Stack
properties.description: Led benchmarking and engineering efforts to integrate Mimir into the firm's observability stack on Kubernetes
properties.impact: Increased metric retention by 50% (+15 days), decreased query time from 5 minutes to 45 seconds

properties.name: Distributed ETL Pipeline for Metrics
properties.description: Solely designed and developed a distributed, highly scalable ETL pipeline in Java Spring Boot that extracted 75 million Kafka records per minute, transformed them into OpenTSDB format, and loaded them onto a HA metrics aggregator, Cortex
properties.impact: Increased real-time metric retrieval up to 60 days (+200%), reducing query time by 50%, resulting in early promotion and tech-excellence award
properties.technologies: Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, OpenTSDB, Cortex

properties.name: Windows Server Monitoring Automation
properties.description: Revamped Windows server monitoring across the firm by seamlessly automating the integration of Prometheus exporter
properties.impact: Made monitoring highly available, reduced system usage by 50%, tripled metric export rate
properties.technologies: Prometheus, Windows Server, Python, Linux Bash

properties.impact: 25% increase in employee efficiency, 75% reduction in bookkeeping time
